text.body:
'dus tshul la lo tsha ba na re rgya che ba mkhyen 3 nang du rgya chung ba sbyor ba chos sku 'du ste rgya mtsho'i nang du chu'i thigs pa bzhin no gsung ngo ||
dge bshes khyung rin chen grags na re 3 po spyi sbyor ba chos sku bye brag yin pa'i phyir ||
spyir bye brag 'dus pa mi tsam dang bud med bzhin no zer|
dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'bar na re 3 pa rang bzhin
sbyor ba chos sku gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi nang du gnas skabs 'dus te rig pa dang bde bsdug bzhin no || zer ba la mkhyen 3 gang mkhyen 3 tsaM mi skye med mngon summngon ‹3› gyis rtogs pa'i mkhyen 3 yin | dang po mi rigs te thams cad mkhyen‹mkhyen› pa nyid 3 gyi sgo nas ces bstod phyag gi sgor gsungs pa'i phyir ro ||
gnyis pa'ang mi rigs te de gsum rgya che ba dang spyi dang rang bzhin ma yin te tshogs sbyor na med pa'i phyir ro ||
yang dge bshes ar na re bstod phyag gi yul nyungs skyon med de mkhyen 3 mtshon byed kyi chos suM bcus sbyor ba chos sku bsdus pa'i phyir ro zer ba yang ma yin te | chos suM bcu la bstod phyag byas pa med pa'i phyir ro || dge bshes 'bre na re 'dir smos yuM sras na rnaM par bzhag 'ga yin la bye brag du gzhi shes pa mtshan nyid pa dang nyan rang 'phags pa | laM shes mtshan nyid pa dang byang 'phags | rnaM mkhyen mtshan nyid pa dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 2 rim pa bzhin rnaM par bjog pa'i rgyu dang des bzhag pa'i sras yin no zhes zer ba mi rigs te |
chos sku thob pa chos can| gzhan don mthar thug ma thob par thal| 'ongs sku ma las longs sprul| de las 'phags chung gsum byon pa ni sras yin no zhes gsung pa ni yang kha 1'dul 'dzin dkar mo na re rnaM pa skye
med mngon suM du rtogs pa'o || zhes zer ba dang rnaM pa skye med du rtogs tsam mo ||
dkar chung ring mo zer ba yang ma yin te| gang zag thub pa kho na'i ma yin pa'i phyir| khyab pa yod de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa dang | thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid| |ces 'dir smos rnam mkhyen thub pa kho na'i mngon rtogs su bshad pa'i phyir ro|| yang dmigs yul rdza sa rigs ma lus pa mkhyen pa ma yin pa'i phyir khyab pa yod de| rnam pa gang dag dang zhes 'dir smos rnam mkhyen gyi rdza sa rigs ma lus pa mkhyen par gsungs pa'i phyir ro| |yang byed pa chos kyi mkhor ma lus pa bskor bar mi nus pa'i phyir khyab pa yod de| gang dang yang dag ldan pas 'di gsungs zhes pa'am| tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste zhes| 'dir smos rnam mkhyen gyis chos kyis 'khor lo ma lus pa bskor bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro| |de lta ma yin nyan rang chen po pa'i mngon rtogs 'dir smos rnam mkhyen yin par thal lo| |gnyis pa rang lugs bzhag pa la gnyis las mtshon bya ni 'dir smos thub pa'i [ - 1 ) 7 - ] [ ， ]rgyu 'bras ngo bo'i rnam pa rdzas rigs ma lus pa kun mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o| |mtshan nyid la gsum| mtshan nyid kyi rang ldog ngos bzung | rigs mi mthun sel tshul| shes byed dgod pa'o| |dang po ni thub pa kho na la yod pa'i yum rtog ldan gyi 'jug yul du gyur pa'o| |bye brag tu spyi mtshan gzhir byas pa la nam mkha' sgyu ma ltar byed pa'i cha ni ji lta ba ji snyed pa kun mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid do| |gnyis pa ni dang pos thub pa kho na'i chos su mtshon la gnyis pas rnam mkhyen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa min pa bsal nas der mtshon cing | gsum pas 'dir smos rnam mkhyen gyis spyi'i rigs mi mthun sel la| nam mkha' ltar 'byed pas ji snyed pa'i cha sel| sgyu ma ltar 'byed pas ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i cha sel lo| |gsum pa ni spyi mtshan gi dang po la dgongs nas| sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces so| |gnyis pa la dgongs nasarnam kun mkhyen nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de zhes so| |gsum pa la dgongs nas| yul ni rnam pa gsum po zhes so| bye brag tu ji lta ba dang ji snyed mkhyen pa la dgongs nas rim pa ltar| zhi ba'i rnam pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o| |zhes pa dang | rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o zhes so| |gsum pa rtsod pa spong ba'i slob lam rnam pa skye med du rtogs pa chos can| rnam mkhyen ma yin par thal| chos gsum min pa'i phyir| 'dod pa la| kun mkhyen gsum du phye bas na| rnam mkhyen du bshad pa dang 'gal la| mtha' gzhan bkag pa'i rigs pas kyang bsal lo zhe na|yang 'bre sogs na re dran pa bcad shes yin te sngar tshogs laM du rigs shes kyis rtogs zin pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes gsung pa ni ma yin te| 'di ltar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i cha yod de mnyaM bzhag ma yin la| mnyaM bzhag la tshogs lam bcad shes ma yin pa'i phyir ro || yang yang kha 1 'bre shes rab 'bar na re sa dgu pa'i'i rjes thob sgoM laM zag bcas yin
te zag pa 'byung du rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i rkyen 2 snang yod pa'i phyir ro || sa dgu pa'i mnyaM bzhag bsgoM laM zag med yin te zag pa 'byung du mi rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i rkyen 2 snang med pa'i phyir ro || zer ba'ang mi 'thad de |
sa brgyad yan chad kyi mos bsngo yi rang gsum sgom lam zag med du thal| zag pa 'byung du mi rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i bdag rkyen tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro| khyab pa med de gnyis snang yod pas 'byung du rung ngo | |zhe na mnyam gzhag tu'ang zag pa 'byung du rung bar thal| phra rgyas ma spangs pa'i phyir ro||
yang yang kha 1dan bag na re dbang swos 'gog
pa yin te phung po'i mthong spang ces mdo las bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni ma yin te lhag med thob par thal ba'i phyir ro ||
gnyis pa rang lugs ni chos lngar zhen pa 'gog pa 'di ltar shes pa'i rten dbangapor zhen pa 'gog pa yin te| mdo las| grong gi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas te| zhes skye bo'i rten grong gi dpes so| |dbang po 'phel 'grib kyi rten du zhen pa 'gog pa yin te| mdo las| grong khyer gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba lami gnas zhes grong 'phel 'grib kyi dpes so| |shes pa'i 'jug ldog gi yul du zhen pa 'gog pa yin te| mdo las| grong rdal gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la mi gnas te| zhes skye bo'i 'jug ldog gi yul gyis so| |sems byung la dbang bsgyur ba sems bdag tu mngon zhen 'gog pa yin te| mdo las| bdag gi gtan gyi sbyor ba dang | rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas zhes bdagagi ba la mnga' bsgyur bas so| |sems kyis mnga' bsgyur bar bya ba sems byung du zhen pa 'gog pa yin te| brgyad stong pa las| blon po dang blon po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas zhes rgyal pos dbang bsgyur bas so| | gsum pa rtsod pa spang ba ni mthong lam skyes pa na dbang sogs ldog par thal| rgyu mthong spang spangs pa'i phyir ro zhe na|The manuscript reproduction is not very legible and most consonants are not legible. This excerpts mostly follows the reading of the BUDA etext for parts that are unclear. shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa | slob dpon dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa rgya gar kyi mkhan po bidya ka ra pra bha dang | zhu chen kyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las | slad kyi paNDita dpal go mi 'chi med la sogs pa dang | lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa ¦ 'grel pa don gsal ba zhes
bya ba tshig dang don legs par bshad pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi rgyan ces bya ba | lulung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ shag kya'i dge slong brtson 'grus rdo rje°o(n grus) °(d)oe° °°s nye bar sbyar ba × rdzogs s+h+yo ||In smaller script than the body of the text. shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa × shes rabr°° mchog gi rgyan ces bya ba × shakya'i dge slong d+ha rma b+ha°°° tra'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos s+ho || shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa | shes rab Possibly a gloss mchog gi rgyan zhes bya ba || shakya'i dge slong d+ha The reproduction of the folio does not allow to see whether something follows.
